task.title: Installing the Application
task.shortdesc: Install the Spark application JAR file as an external library for . If your custom Spark application depends on external libraries other than the , install those libraries in the same location as well.

context.note: To include all dependent libraries used in your custom Spark application, you can use the Apache Maven Dependency Plugin. For more information about the Dependency Plugin, see .

p.note: The Spark Evaluator processor is included in several CDH and MapR stage libraries. When you install external libraries for the processor, you must make them accessible to the stage library that you are using.
